function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of SARS CoV-2 coronavirus pandemic","Impact":"Excess deaths and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health measures and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing kits, and remote monitoring systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Large number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in Europe","Impact":"Pressure on healthcare infrastructure and resources","Mitigation":"Increased testing, capacity expansion, and resource allocation","Technologies":"Testing kits, telemedicine, and data analytics","People":"Public health officials, healthcare providers, and policymakers","Owner":"Government and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"State of Emergency and implementation of preventive or containment quarantine in Spain","Impact":"Disruption of economic and social activities","Mitigation":"Policy support, financial aid, and remote work arrangements","Technologies":"Digital platforms, teleconferencing, and remote collaboration tools","People":"Businesses, employees, and the general population","Owner":"Government, businesses, and employers"}]}
